overview:
Koshika Lifesciences Academy Lucknow, established and run by Ex-IITians offers classroom coaching programme and On-Line Test-Series for GATE-Biotechnology/Lifesciences, CSIR-NET (JRF) Life Sciences, JNU M.Sc Biotech entrance, IIT-JAM, GPAT and NIPER-JEE.

CSIR-NET/GATE/JNU M.Sc Entrance/IIT-JAM/GPAT (Biotechnology/LifeSciences) Classroom Coaching at Koshika LifeSciences Academy, Lucknow (A reputed Coaching Institute for Biotech & Life Sciences run by ex-IITians) We Offer ï‚§ 6 months of regular classroom coaching programme for CSIR-NET-JRF (life Sciences), GATE Biotechnology/Life Sciences, JNU M.SC Biotech & IIT-JAM entrance Exams ï‚§ 3 hours and 4 days in a week class ï‚§ Highly Experienced and extra brilliant faculty members mostly Ex-IITians ï‚§ Visiting faculties are from CDRI, NBRI, SGPGI, IITR and Biotech Park ï‚§ Practice by More than 5000+MCQs & Printed study materials on tough topics ï‚§ Proper coverage and In depth analysis of whole Syllabus ï‚§ Regular Topic, Unit & Mock Tests ï‚§ Problem solving and doubt clearing sessions ï‚§ On-Line Test-Series ï‚§ After EXAM admission guidance ï‚§ Fully Air-Conditioned Classrooms ï‚§ Separate Boys & Girls hostel with mess facility

Admission Open For more detail and queries please contact at 09450190335 or e-mail us at contact@koshika.co.in Address——- C-405, 2nd floor, Sahara Plaza, Patrakarpuram, Gomti Nagar, Lucknow
